ChatGPT said:

Hereâ€™s a clean, minimal Splide slider initialized with jQuery. Splide itself is vanilla JS, but you can safely initialize it inside jQueryâ€™s $(document).ready().

1ï¸âƒ£ Include Splide + jQuery

html
<!-- jQuery -->
<script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.7.1.min.js"></script>

<!-- Splide CSS -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/css/splide.min.css">

<!-- Splide JS -->
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/js/splide.min.js"></script>

2ï¸âƒ£ HTML Markup

html
<div id="splide" class="splide">
  <div class="splide__track">
    <ul class="splide__list">
      <li class="splide__slide">Slide 1</li>
      <li class="splide__slide">Slide 2</li>
      <li class="splide__slide">Slide 3</li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>

3ï¸âƒ£ Initialize with jQuery

html
<script>
  $(document).ready(function () {
    new Splide('#splide', {
      type      : 'loop',
      perPage   : 3,
      gap       : '1rem',
      autoplay  : true,
      pauseOnHover: true,
      breakpoints: {
        768: {
          perPage: 1,
        },
        1024: {
          perPage: 2,
        },
      },
    }).mount();
  });
</script>

4ï¸âƒ£ Optional Styling

html
<style>
  .splide__slide {
    background: #eee;
    padding: 40px;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 20px;
  }
</style>

ðŸ”¥ Common jQuery-Friendly Tips

  • You can re-mount Splide after AJAX loads:

    js
    splide.destroy();
splide.mount();

  • Multiple sliders:

    js
    $('.splide').each(function () {
  new Splide(this).mount();
});

If you want:

  • thumbnails

  • synced sliders

  • vertical mode

  • custom arrows / pagination

  • dynamic slides via AJAX

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Splide Slider (jQuery)</title>

  <!-- jQuery -->
  <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.7.1.min.js"></script>

  <!-- Splide CSS -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/css/splide.min.css">

  <!-- Splide JS -->
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/js/splide.min.js"></script>

  <style>
    body {
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
      padding: 40px;
    }
    .splide__slide {
      background: #f2f2f2;
      padding: 50px;
      text-align: center;
      font-size: 22px;
      border-radius: 8px;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  <div id="splide" class="splide">
    <div class="splide__track">
      <ul class="splide__list">
        <li class="splide__slide">Slide 1</li>
        <li class="splide__slide">Slide 2</li>
        <li class="splide__slide">Slide 3</li>
        <li class="splide__slide">Slide 4</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>

  <script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
      new Splide('#splide', {
        type: 'loop',
        perPage: 3,
        gap: '1rem',
        autoplay: true,
        pauseOnHover: true,
        breakpoints: {
          1024: { perPage: 2 },
          768: { perPage: 1 }
        }
      }).mount();
    });
  </script>

</body>
</html>

ChatGPT said:

Samajh gaya ðŸ‘
Tum chahte ho center slide fully visible ho, aur left + right slides thode fade / opacity overlay ke sath dikhein â€” carousel focus effect ðŸ”¥

Ye Splide me CSS se easily ho jata hai, JS change nahi karna padega.

âœ… Splide Option (focus center)

Script me focus: 'center' add karo:

js
new Splide('#splide', {
  type: 'loop',
  focus: 'center',
  perPage: 3,
  gap: '1.5rem',
  autoplay: true,
  pauseOnHover: true,
  breakpoints: {
    1024: { perPage: 2 },
    768: { perPage: 1 }
  }
}).mount();

ðŸŽ¨ CSS â€“ Side Slides Opacity Overlay

Is CSS ko add kar do:

css
/* Default fade for all slides */
.splide__slide {
  opacity: 0.4;
  transition: opacity 0.4s ease, transform 0.4s ease;
}

/* Center (active) slide */
.splide__slide.is-active {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: scale(1.05);
}

/* Optional overlay effect */
.splide__slide::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  background: rgba(0,0,0,0.25);
  opacity: 1;
  transition: opacity 0.4s ease;
  border-radius: 12px;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* Remove overlay from active slide */
.splide__slide.is-active::after {
  opacity: 0;
}

/* Needed for overlay positioning */
.splide__slide {
  position: relative;
}

âœ” Center card 100% visible & zoomed
âœ” Left / Right cards opacity + dark overlay

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Splide Center Focus Slider</title>

  <!-- jQuery -->
  <script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.7.1.min.js"></script>

  <!-- Splide CSS -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/css/splide.min.css">

  <!-- Splide JS -->
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@splidejs/splide@4.1.4/dist/js/splide.min.js"></script>

  <style>
    body {
      font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
      background: #f2f2f2;
      padding: 50px;
    }

    /* ---------- SLIDE FADE EFFECT ---------- */
    .splide__slide {
      position: relative;
      opacity: 0.4;
      transition: all 0.4s ease;
    }

    .splide__slide.is-active {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scale(1.05);
      z-index: 2;
    }

    /* Dark overlay */
    .splide__slide::after {
      content: '';
      position: absolute;
      inset: 0;
      background: rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
      opacity: 1;
      transition: opacity 0.4s ease;
      border-radius: 12px;
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    .splide__slide.is-active::after {
      opacity: 0;
    }

    /* ---------- CARD STYLE ---------- */
    .slide-card {
      background: #fff;
      border-radius: 12px;
      overflow: hidden;
      box-shadow: 0 10px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.15);
      padding: 15px;
    }

    .slide-card img {
      width: 100%;
      border-radius: 8px;
      margin-bottom: 12px;
    }

    .slide-card h3 {
      font-size: 18px;
      margin: 10px 0 5px;
    }

    .slide-card p {
      font-size: 14px;
      color: #555;
      line-height: 1.5;
    }

    .stars {
      margin-top: 10px;
      color: #f5a623;
      font-size: 18px;
    }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  <div id="splide" class="splide">
    <div class="splide__track">
      <ul class="splide__list">

        <li class="splide__slide">
          <div class="slide-card">
            <img src="https://picsum.photos/400/250?1">
            <h3>Card One</h3>
            <p>Ye card description hai. Yahan text aayega.</p>
            <div class="stars">â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…</div>
          </div>
        </li>

        <li class="splide__slide">
          <div class="slide-card">
            <img src="https://picsum.photos/400/250?2">
            <h3>Card Two</h3>
            <p>Second card ka content yahan likha hua hai.</p>
            <div class="stars">â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜…â˜†</div>
          </div>
        </li>

        <li class="splide__slide">
          <div class="slide-card">
            <img src="https://picsum.photos/400/250?3">
            <h3>Card Three</h3>

âš ï¸ Important truth

CSS filter exact hex color 100% match nahi karta, lekin bahut close laa sakte hain.

âœ… Best Approx Filter for #f2a23c

css

        invert(69%) sepia(63%)
        saturate(676%) hue-rotate(345deg)
        brightness(101%) contrast(101%);

  filter: brightness(0) saturate(100%)
          invert(69%) sepia(63%)
          saturate(676%) hue-rotate(345deg)
          brightness(101%) contrast(101%);
}

ðŸŸ¡ When to use this

âœ” PNG / JPG icons
âœ” Black icons â†’ colored icons
âœ” Hover effects

ðŸ”¥ BETTER OPTIONS (Recommended)

  fill: #f2a23c;
}

âœ… PNG using mask (100% accurate)

  background-color: #f2a23c;
  -webkit-mask: url(icon.png) no-repeat center;
  mask: url(icon.png) no-repeat center;
}

Tum client-side only solution chahte ho jisme:

1ï¸âƒ£ User form fill karke submit kare
2ï¸âƒ£ Popup (alert / modal) show ho
3ï¸âƒ£ Data ek alag page me save ho
4ï¸âƒ£ Wo page sirf tumhare liye ho (client ke liye nahi)
5ï¸âƒ£ No backend, no database â€” simple & working

ðŸ‘‰ Best solution: JavaScript + localStorage

âœ… FLOW

  • Form submit

  • Data localStorage me save

  • Popup show

  • Redirect to private data page

ðŸ”¹ PAGE 1: contact.html (Form Page)

âœ… HTML (tumhara form + JS)

html
<form id="contactForm">
  <div class="mb-3">
    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="name" placeholder="Your Name" required>
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <input type="email" class="form-control" id="email" placeholder="Your Email" required>
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <input type="text" class="form-control" id="subject" placeholder="Subject">
  </div>
  <div class="mb-3">
    <textarea class="form-control" id="message" placeholder="Your Message" rows="5"></textarea>
  </div>
  <button class="formbtn" type="submit">Send Message</button>
</form>

<script>
  document.getElementById("contactForm").addEventListener("submit", function(e) {
    e.preventDefault();

    let data = {
      name: document.getElementById("name").value,
      email: document.getElementById("email").value,
      subject: document.getElementById("subject").value,
      message: document.getElementById("message").value,
      time: new Date().toLocaleString()
    };

    let messages = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("messages")) || [];
    messages.push(data);
    localStorage.setItem("messages", JSON.stringify(messages));

    alert("Message sent successfully!");

    this.reset();
    window.location.href = "data.html"; // private page
  });
</script>

ðŸ”¹ PAGE 2: data.html (PRIVATE â€“ Only for You)

âš ï¸ Is page ka link kahin mat do client ko.

âœ… HTML

html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title>Private Messages</title>
  <style>
    body {
      font-family: Arial;
      padding: 30px;
      background: #f4f4f4;
    }
    .card {
      background: #fff;
      padding: 20px;
      margin-bottom: 15px;
      border-radius: 8px;
      box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
    }
    h3 { margin: 0 0 5px; }
    small { color: #777; }
  </style>
</head>
<body>

  <h2>Saved Messages (Private)</h2>
  <div id="data"></div>

  <script>
    let messages = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("messages")) || [];
    let container = document.getElementById("data");

    if (messages.length === 0) {
      container.innerHTML = "<p>No data found.</p>";
    }

    messages.forEach(msg => {
      container.innerHTML += `
        <div class="card">
          <h3>${msg.name}</h3>
          <p><strong>Email:</strong> ${msg.email}</p>
          <p><strong>Subject:</strong> ${msg.subject}</p>
          <p>${msg.message}</p>
          <small>${msg.time}</small>
        </div>
      `;
    });
  </script>

</body>
</html>

ðŸ” Important (Honest Note)

âš ï¸ Ye data:

  • browser ke localStorage me save hota hai

  • sirf us device/browser me dikhega

  • hosting change ya cache clear hone par data chala jayega

ðŸ”¥ Agar tum NEXT LEVEL chaho

ðŸ“ script.js

js
/* ===============================
   MOBILE MENU
================================ */
function openMenu() {
  document.getElementById("mobileMenu").style.left = "0";
}

function closeMenu() {
  document.getElementById("mobileMenu").style.left = "-100%";
}

/* ===============================
   HERO SLIDER
================================ */
const slides = document.querySelectorAll(".slide");
const nextBtn = document.querySelector(".next");
const prevBtn = document.querySelector(".prev");

let current = 0;

function showSlide(index) {
  slides.forEach(slide => slide.classList.remove("active"));
  slides[index].classList.add("active");
}

if (slides.length) {
  nextBtn.onclick = () => {
    current = (current + 1) % slides.length;
    showSlide(current);
  };

  prevBtn.onclick = () => {
    current = (current - 1 + slides.length) % slides.length;
    showSlide(current);
  };

  setInterval(() => {
    current = (current + 1) % slides.length;
    showSlide(current);
  }, 4000);
}

/* ===============================
   TESTIMONIAL SPLIDE
================================ */
$(document).ready(function () {
  if (document.getElementById("splide")) {
    new Splide('#splide', {
      type: 'loop',
      perPage: 3,
      gap: '1.5rem',
      autoplay: true,
      pauseOnHover: true,
      breakpoints: {
        1024: { perPage: 2 },
        768: { perPage: 1 }
      }
    }).mount();
  }
});

/* ===============================
   CONTACT FORM (LOCAL STORAGE)
================================ */
const contactForm = document.getElementById("contactForm");

if (contactForm) {
  contactForm.addEventListener("submit", function (e) {
    e.preventDefault();

    let data = {
      name: document.getElementById("name").value,
      email: document.getElementById("email").value,
      subject: document.getElementById("subject").value,
      message: document.getElementById("message").value,
      time: new Date().toLocaleString()
    };

    let messages = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("messages")) || [];
    messages.push(data);
    localStorage.setItem("messages", JSON.stringify(messages));

    alert("Message sent successfully!");
    this.reset();
    window.location.href = "index.html";
  });

Step 2: JS me delete functionality add karo

Tumhare existing script ke neeche ye add karo:

js
// Get all delete buttons
document.querySelectorAll(".deleteBtn").forEach(button => {
  button.addEventListener("click", function() {
    // Confirm deletion
    if (!confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this message?")) return;

    // Get parent card and its index
    const card = this.closest(".card");
    const index = parseInt(card.getAttribute("data-index"));

    // Remove from localStorage array
    let messages = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("messages")) || [];
    messages.splice(index, 1); // remove 1 item at position 'index'
    localStorage.setItem("messages", JSON.stringify(messages));

    // Remove card from DOM
    card.remove();

    // Optional: show message if no data left
    if (messages.length === 0) {
      document.getElementById("data").innerHTML = "<p>No data found.</p>";
    }
  });
});

âœ… Ye code kya karta hai:

  1. Har delete button pe click event lagata hai

  3. Card ka data-index fetch karta hai â†’ ye array me position hai

  4. splice() se localStorage array me se delete karta hai

  5. DOM se card remove kar deta hai

  6. Agar koi message nahi bacha â†’ â€œNo data foundâ€ show karta hai
